AT.name: Duck Hunt
AT.description: Duck Hunt wurde als einer der ersten Titel für das Nintendo Entertainment System™ veröffentlicht und ist ein echter Klassiker, der deine Reflexe auf eine harte Probe stellen wird. Achtung, Zielen... und Schuss! Wenn die Enten zu Boden gehen, gewinnst du. Schießt du daneben, musst du das Gekicher deines Jagdhunds ertragen! Heute spielt man es mit der Wii-Fernbedienung anstelle des Zappers, doch davon abgesehen ist es noch genauso, wie du es in Erinnerung hast. Die Modi Game A und Game B bieten unterschiedliche Schwierigkeitsgrade (und ein zweiter Spieler kann sogar die Ente steuern!), während Game C dank schneller, kleiner Tontauben noch anspruchsvoller ist. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Duck Hunt
AU.description: Originally released as a launch title for the NES™, Duck Hunt is a true classic that will really test your reflexes. Ready, aim...pow! If the ducks go down, you win. If the shots go wide, you’ll suffer your hunting dog’s sniggering! Now played with the Wii Remote instead of the Zapper light gun, it’s otherwise exactly as you might remember it. Game A and Game B modes offer different difficulty levels (and a second player can even control the duck!) while Game C ups the challenge further with fast, small clay pigeons. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Duck Hunt
BG.description: Originally released as a launch title for the NES™, Duck Hunt is a true classic that will really test your reflexes. Ready, aim...pow! If the ducks go down, you win. If the shots go wide, you’ll suffer your hunting dog’s sniggering! Now played with the Wii Remote instead of the Zapper light gun, it’s otherwise exactly as you might remember it. Game A and Game B modes offer different difficulty levels (and a second player can even control the duck!) while Game C ups the challenge further with fast, small clay pigeons. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Duck Hunt
BE.description: Sorti pour la première fois sur NES™, Duck Hunt est un vrai classique qui mettra vos réflexes à rude épreuve. Prêt, feu... pan ! Si le canard tombe, vous gagnez. Si vous le ratez, vous subirez les moqueries de votre chien de chasse ! Jouez désormais avec la télécommande Wii, et non plus avec le Zapper. Les modes de jeux A et B possèdent différents niveaux de difficulté (le joueur 2 peut même contrôler le canard !), tandis que le mode C pousse le challenge encore plus loin en augmentant la rapidité des petites cibles d'argile. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Duck Hunt
ES.description: Duck Hunt, lanzado originalmente como juego para la consola NES™, es un clásico que pondrá a prueba tus reflejos. Preparados, listos... ¡ya! Si los patos caen, tú ganas. Si tus disparos se pierden en el horizonte, tu perro de caza se reirá de ti. Aparte de que ahora se controla con el mando de Wii en vez de con el Zapper, es el mismo juego de toda la vida. Los modos A y B ofrecen diferentes niveles de dificultad (¡y la posibilidad de que otro jugador controle al pato!), mientras que el modo C es un desafío todavía mayor, ya que tendrás que disparar a los pequeños y rápidos platos de barro. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Duck Hunt
IT.description: Apparso per la prima volta come titolo per NES™, Duck Hunt è un autentico classico che metterà alla prova i tuoi riflessi. Pronti... mirare... fuoco! Stendi le anatre e vinci. Ma se sbagli la mira, non prendertela se il tuo aiutante canino si farà quattro risate. Se una volta c'era il NES Zapper, oggi devi usare il telecomando Wii, ma la meccanica è esattamente come te la ricordi. Le due modalità di gioco A e B ti consentono di cimentarti in livelli di difficoltà diversi (un altro giocatore può perfino fare l'anatra!); se invece vuoi spingere la sfida al limite, nella modalità C dovrai fare i conti con imprendibili piccioni d'argilla. Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Duck Hunt
NL.description: Het origineel Duck Hunt voor de NES is een ware klassieker die je reflexen op de proef stelde. Klaar om te vuren... knal! Je wint als je eenden uit de lucht schiet. Je verliest als eenden ontsnappen, en alsof dat niet erg genoeg is lacht de jachthond je ook nog eens uit! Deze versie is identiek aan het origineel, enkel speel je nu met de Wii-afstandsbediening in plaats van de Zapper. De spelstanden Game A en Game B bieden ieder een andere moeilijkheidsgraad (een tweede speler kan zelfs de eenden besturen), terwijl Game C snellere en kleinere kleiduiven het beeld inschiet. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Duck Hunt
NZ.description: Originally released as a launch title for the NES™, Duck Hunt is a true classic that will really test your reflexes. Ready, aim...pow! If the ducks go down, you win. If the shots go wide, you’ll suffer your hunting dog’s sniggering! Now played with the Wii Remote instead of the Zapper light gun, it’s otherwise exactly as you might remember it. Game A and Game B modes offer different difficulty levels (and a second player can even control the duck!) while Game C ups the challenge further with fast, small clay pigeons. This is the US version of the game.

PL.name: Duck Hunt
PL.description: Originally released as a launch title for the NES™, Duck Hunt is a true classic that will really test your reflexes. Ready, aim...pow! If the ducks go down, you win. If the shots go wide, you’ll suffer your hunting dog’s sniggering! Now played with the Wii Remote instead of the Zapper light gun, it’s otherwise exactly as you might remember it. Game A and Game B modes offer different difficulty levels (and a second player can even control the duck!) while Game C ups the challenge further with fast, small clay pigeons. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Duck Hunt
PT.description: Lançado originalmente para a consola NES™, Duck Hunt é um clássico que colocará à prova os teus reflexos. Preparado, aponta... atira! Se os patos caírem, tu ganhas. Se os teus disparos se perderem no horizonte, o teu cão de caça vai-se rir de ti! É exatamente o mesmo jogo já teu conhecido, mas que agora podes controlar com o comando Wii em vez de utilizares a pistola Zapper. Os modos Game A e Game B oferecem diferentes níveis de dificuldade (e a possibilidade de que um segundo jogador possa controlar o pato!), enquanto que no modo Game C, onde os alvos serão pequenas e rápidas pombas de barro, o desafio será ainda maior! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Duck Hunt
RU.description: Классическая игра Duck Hunt, первоначально вышедшая на NES™, — суровое испытание для вашей реакции. Готовься, целься... бах! Меткий выстрел сделает вас победителем, ну а над любым промахом весело посмеется ваш верный охотничий пес. Игра не претерпела существенных изменений, только теперь вместо светового пистолета у вас в руках пульт Wii. В режимах Game A и Game B представлены уровни различной степени сложности (второй игрок даже может управлять утками!), а в режиме Game С вам нужно будет стрелять по быстро движущимся глиняным тарелкам. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.
